q: In just filed court papers Camille asks a judge to deny Kelsey Grammer 's request to dissolve their 13 year marriage while they continue battling over their 120 million dollar estate. Camille writes in the court papers, It is my understanding that( Kelsey Grammer ) is seeking to terminate the marriage solely for the reason that he intends to remarry as soon as possible.`` I don't believe that is a sufficient reason to prejudice my rights to our estate. The Frasier star appeared on the Late Show with David Letterman Thursday night and sounded resolute about his plans for a quickie divorce from Camille, so he can tie the knot with Kayte Walsh soon.``

Eric Schmidt , 55, has no doubt Page is ready for the challenges ahead.`` Larry has been with me in every major decision in the past decade,'' Eric Schmidt said in an interview Thursday. It's not like he has been sitting around doing nothing. Although management by committee worked well enough to turn Google into an enormous success, it eventually slowed Google's reaction to popular new ideas such as Facebook and Twitter.
